articles.title: Great News for Stargazers: Northern Lights Activity Is Officially on the Rise in the US - Martha Stewart
articles.description: The Northern Lights are typically most visible near the North and South Poles, but increased activity has made them visible in many areas across the United States. Over the next year, it's believed aurora borealis activity will be stronger than it has been in…
articles.content: While the Northern Lights are traditionally most visible near the North and South Poles, there have been recent sightings of the phenomenon reaching Minnesota and even Pennsylvania. The increased sol… [+1458 chars]
